general.name: translate
general.shortDesc: Translates a string in the user's language.

definition.desc: Returns a string translated in the eyeOS' language of the user.

params.name: string
params.desc: Native string of an application to translate.

params.name: tokens
params.desc: Indexed array containing the value of the tokens appearing on the string.

definition.return: Returns the translated string into the user's eyeOS language.
